description: Mobile techniques used by Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.Agent.ao, ATT&CK software S0307 (v1.0)

techniques.comment: [Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.Agent.ao](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0307) uses Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) for command and control.(Citation: Kaspersky-MobileMalware)
